description: Kink University takes you deep behind these scenes of DeviceBondage.com, one of the most ingeniously sadistic BDSM sites in history. Our cameras take you to never-before-shown backstage glimpses of the entire two-day process of designing, building, and shooting an episode of Device Bondage. Director JP "The Pope" and device-builder Lucas explain the history, planning process, sadistic toy creation, and construction secrets of a real Device Bondage shoot, featuring the tough and beautiful model Holly Heart.
title: Deep Inside: Device Bondage (Behind the Scenes)
